pages.title: Thermal Heater
pages.text: A fuel-burning heater that radiates warmth in its vicinity. Right-click with coal, wood, or other fuel to activate.$(br2)Essential for early survival. Place these in your base to keep temperatures livable through Phases 2-4. Multiple heaters stack their warmth.$(br2)Can be $(l:heating/heater_upgrades)upgraded$(/l) with iron, gold, or diamond for greater output.
Surround a Thermal Core with 8 iron ingots.
